title: Out of all the ADC's, who do you reckon is the 'hardest' to play?
body: I'm putting money on Draven, then Vayne. What about you guys?

replies.body:
Probably Ashe or Caitlyn.

Maybe Ezreal.

so really, you picked one of the easiest, one of the worst (still easy) and one of the most common (thus basic)

late game varus is pure right click if you build it right. but i agree with kalista and draven, draven is a little difficult because you have to keep catching because of Q nad kalista because of her passive.

so lategame varus loses out on the power of 3 AAs and then a spell? because honestly...thats where his only DIFFERENCE to other ADC come from.

without it, cait right click alone does more because of passive, and same with anyone else with ACTUAL stat boost like trist AS, vayne % damage and R.
I would have to go with Draven or with Kalista, they both have unique mechanics that is hard to learn and even harder to master.
i dont really think draven q is enough in depth mechanics to make him the hardest adc in game, imo vayne and kalista seem to be the hardest tier due to their mechanical mastery

Vayne > Drav 

Mostly because Drav is just get a small lead early and you'll 2 hit people the rest of the game while Vayne you need T1 positioning and mechanics for all stages of the game.
Draven for sure, then maybe Ezreal for his skillshots

Kalista's passive I've heard is quite hard to master. I can also say that we have lost some botlane duels because Kalista misclicked and she can't cancel her aa on a minion. If you can master her passive she's a good champ. Other than her yes Vayne because of her range and Draaaaaaaaven because of your q (although your axes are quite easy to catch, it takes a bit to master)
